item.title: For Trump, Military Strike in Iran Could Serve Symbolic Purpose
item.description:
Some officials in the Trump administration hope an attack would force Iran to give up its nuclear enrichment program. Others have doubts.

item.title: A Deal or War? Crucial Talks to Begin Between U.S. and Iran
item.description:
